mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_password, user_iphone, user_url, user_email, user_account, user_detail,user_steam_id,user_steam_key
mapper.select: select * from user_info where user_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from user_info where user_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or user_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from user_info where user_email like #{parm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or user_id like #{parm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or user_detail like #{parm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or user_name like #{parm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_name, user_password, user_iphone, user_url, user_email, user_account, user_detail,user_steam_id,user_steam_key) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{userSteamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{userSteamKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

user_name,

mapper.update:
update user_info
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_iphone = #{userIphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_url = #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_detail = #{userDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_iphone = #{userIphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_url = #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_detail = #{userDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_steam_id=#{userSteamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_steam_key=#{userSteamKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
